snippet.title: Put Your Java Program on a Website (Tutorial)
snippet.description:
Head to squarespace.com/alexlee to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain using code ALEXLEE

New course coming soon! Learn Java Fast launches on July 1st, 2020. Stay informed and join the waitlist: https://course.alexlorenlee.com/courses/learn-java-fast

In this video, I will show you how to put your java program on a website using the Squarespace Free Trial. There are some limitations to the trial, such as:

14-Days
Private or Password protected
No custom domain

However, this is GREAT practice and you can still share it with your friends, for free! And if you do choose to upgrade, you have everything set up to show off your program to the world!

Links in this video:
1. Setup Squarespace: squarespace.com/alexlee
2. Get the code: https://github.com/alexlorenlee/JavaTutorialCode/blob/master/Programs/JavaWebsiteCode.html
3. Setup JDoodle: https://www.jdoodle.com/compiler-api/
4. Farts.java: https://github.com/alexlorenlee/JavaTutorialCode/blob/master/Programs/Farts.java
5. Convert to String: https://www.freeformatter.com/java-dotnet-escape.html

I hope this helps you get your java program on a website using Squarespace :) This is GREAT practice for getting your feet wet doing custom web development!

I hope you enjoyed Java website tutorial!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ -

Free tips and programs: http://alexlorenlee.com

Recommended Channels to Subscribe to
Career Karma: https://youtube.com/channel/UCkCwv67-HTCzIhxLG8aHOQQ
TheNewBoston: https://youtube.com/user/thenewboston

~
https://discord.com/invite/Yk3uqST
https://instagram.com/alexlorenlee
https://youtube.com/channel/UCLkeDGcXfiKlN2imazwkg4A (2nd channel)

Alex Lee
